title: Shonda Rhimes: Change Your Life By Saying “Yes” (And "No" Too)
description: Prolific TV show creator, writer and executive producer Shonda Rhimes reflects on her memoir “Year of Yes.” The force behind the hit shows "Grey's Anatomy," "Scandal" and "How to Get Away with Murder," Shonda explains how saying “yes” for one year allowed her to live a more awakened life. She also shares the one sentence to use when you want to say “no” without feeling rude.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)

She also shares the one sentence to use when you want to say “no” without feeling rude.
